text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙar musrikon] Bigu: «Guvohii ci kase az hama ʙehtar ast»? Bigu: «Alloh taolo [ki] mijoni manu sumo guvoh ast va in Qur'on [az coniʙi U] ʙar man vahj sudaast, to ʙa vasilai on ʙa sumo va har ki [in pajom ʙa u] merasad, husdor diham. Ojo sumo ʙa rosti guvohi medihed, ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙudoni digare hast?» Bigu: «Man [hargiz ʙa cunin cize] guvohi namediham». Bigu: «Jaqinan U tanho ma'ʙudi jagona ast va man az on ci [ʙo U] sarik qaror medihed, ʙezoram»
